name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.customCond:
EXISTS(SELECT * FROM `RELATION` t31 
 WHERE 
 t1.`ID` = t31.`TARGET_ID`  AND  ( ( t31.`PRINCIPAL_TYPE` = 'work_item'  OR  t31.`PRINCIPAL_TYPE` = 'bug' )  AND  t31.`TARGET_TYPE` = 'test_case'  AND  t31.`PRINCIPAL_ID` = #{ctx.webcontext.principal_id} ) )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.name: 查询条件

queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`CREATE_MAN`,
t1.`CREATE_TIME`,
t1.`CUR_VERSION_ID`,
t1.`DESCRIPTION`,
t1.`ID`,
t1.`IDENTIFIER`,
t1.`IS_ARCHIVED`,
t1.`IS_DELETED`,
t1.`LEVEL`,
t21.`IDENTIFIER` AS `LIBRARY_IDENTIFIER`,
t1.`MAINTENANCE_ID`,
t1.`MAINTENANCE_NAME`,
t1.`NAME`,
t1.`PRECONDITION`,
t1.`REVIEW_RESULT_STATE`,
concat(t21.`IDENTIFIER`,'-',t1.`IDENTIFIER`) AS `SHOW_IDENTIFIER`,
t1.`STATE`,
t11.`SUITES`,
t1.`SUITE_ID`,
t11.`NAME` AS `SUITE_NAME`,
t1.`TEST_LIBRARY_ID`,
t21.`NAME` AS `TEST_LIBRARY_NAME`,
t1.`TEST_TYPE`,
t1.`TITLE`,
t1.`TYPE`,
t1.`UPDATE_MAN`,
t1.`UPDATE_TIME`
FROM `TEST_CASE` t1 
LEFT JOIN `TEST_SUITE` t11 ON t1.`SUITE_ID` = t11.`ID` 
LEFT JOIN `LIBRARY` t21 ON t1.`TEST_LIBRARY_ID` = t21.`ID`
